function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on the mathematical modeling for epidemics and recent papers related to SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Limited exploration of other factors influencing disease dynamics","Mitigation":"Incorporate broader socio-environmental factors into the modeling","Technologies":"Advanced mathematical modeling techniques","People":"Scientific community","Owner":"Research institutions"},{"Description":"Use of equation-based models to simulate the epidemic dynamics","Impact":"Oversimplification of real-world disease dynamics","Mitigation":"Incorporate agent-based models for more nuanced simulations","Technologies":"Agent-based modeling software","People":"Modelers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, modeling software developers"},{"Description":"Use of the SEIR model with a known incubation period","Impact":"Limited consideration of varying incubation periods across different populations","Mitigation":"Incorporate population-specific data for incubation periods","Technologies":"Epidemiological data collection and analysis tools","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"}]}
